meanings.definition: Relating to the measurement of viscosity.
meanings.sent1: The viscometric test showed how thick the liquid was.
meanings.sent2: The scientist conducted a viscometric analysis to determine the fluid's thickness.
meanings.sent3: The viscometric experiment was so interesting that even the students were eager to learn.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked in a viscometric manner, slowly processing each detail.
meanings.sent5: The viscometric measurement painted a clear picture of the liquid's consistency.
